# <a name="import-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="7a058-102">匯入連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-102">Import contacts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7a058-103">將連絡人匯入至網頁上的 Outlook 之前，您必須將它們從其他電子郵件提供者匯出為 .csv 檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-103">Before importing contacts to Outlook on the web, you'll need to export them from your other email provider as a .csv file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7a058-104">然後，遵循下列指示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-104">Then, follow the instructions below.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7a058-105">在頁面底部，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-105">At the bottom of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7a058-106">**人員**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-106">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7a058-107">在工具列上，選取 [**管理**匯  >  **入連絡人**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-107">On the toolbar, select **Manage** > **Import contacts**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="7a058-108">選取 **[流覽]**，選擇您的 CSV 檔案，然後選取 [ **開啟**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-108">Select **Browse**, choose your CSV file, and then select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="7a058-109">選取 [匯入]\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-109">Select **Import**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7a058-110">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [將連絡人匯入 Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a058-110">To learn more, see [Import contacts to Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span></span>
